h2_title: Hundred-Eyed Daoist Master Boss Fight and Guide
content: The last piece of his health bar is by far the scariest to take down, and you'll need to constantly be watching his electrified talismans to anticipate where his next big blast is coming from. If you have extra mana, you can also try going for the Pluck of Mana, or just focus on more Immobilizations and Rock Solid Deflections.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Hundred-Eyed_Daoist_Master.md', within the main section titled 'Hundred-Eyed Daoist Master', specifically from the subsection 'Hundred-Eyed Daoist Master Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
The last piece of his health bar is by far the scariest to take down, and you'll need to constantly be watching his electrified talismans to anticipate where his next big blast is coming from. If you have extra mana, you can also try going for the Pluck of Mana, or just focus on more Immobilizations and Rock Solid Deflections.
